'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item }} in {{poe2}}.

You can extract the stone from the head to gain a [Sigil of Death Wardstone](/sigilOfDeathWardstone/), destroying the skull in the process.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition
